author: MasterOfPuzzles
title: Big fun for young Ben 10/Bionicle fans
review: Yes, these sets don't have too many pieces, but the action figures are BIG poseable and the pieces are pretty good. On this one I especially like the wing. The combination models suggested in the instructions look great! Will have to try them once we get a few more Ben 10 sets.

author: michaelvader
title: I was the 1st guy to review all the ben 10 sets but not this one
review:
I like Jet Ray a lot and on the side of the box it says super jet ray so I don't know what that is but here are the pros and cons!

pros:
Tail
dark red chest
head looks nice
glow in the dark eyes and sign on his chest
wings are hard rubber but can move easelliy

cons:
hard to pose with wings but they are still cool

I like this a lot so get it! 5/5

author: Legonat
title: Junk.
review:
Eventually sold it. This is undoubtedly the WORST set I (used to [thankfully]) own!

Pros : ?

Cons:

  • Expensive,
  • Flimsy plastic,
  • Barely any build,
  • Looks disgusting,
  • Even with the other sets it lack playability,
  • Hard to snap the pieces together.

Overall a terrible 1/5!
